attributes.action: Make two people hiring a car accountable for dangerous driving.
attributes.background: The case http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-nottinghamshire-35472617 where the driver of a rental car runs down someone but avoids any serious punishment is outrageous in a civilised society. The law should change so that it does not implicitly condone such behaviour by its inability to prosecute.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
